about.title: About Music Gallery
about.p1: Hello! I am <bold1>Mateus Maffi</bold1>, a passionate musician and creator of <bold2>Music Gallery</bold2>. This space was created with the purpose of sharing my musical journey through <bold3>covers of national and international songs</bold3>, performed with great feeling and dedication.
about.p2: Music has been part of my life since an early age. Over the years, I have learned to play and develop my voice, always striving to convey the essence of each song. Every video here represents a bit of my artistic identity and what I believe in music: <italic>emotion, authenticity, and connection</italic>.
about.p3: At <bold1>Music Gallery</bold1>, you will find covers from various genres ‚Äî from <italic2>sertanejo to MPB, from pop to rock</italic2> ‚Äî all recorded with care, creativity, and attention to detail.
about.p4: Feel free to explore the videos, leave suggestions, follow me on social media, and, of course, share with friends! This project is made with love and is constantly evolving.
about.p5: Thank you for being part of this. üéµ
